sections.title: Description
sections.raw_content: The cls (clear screen) procedure is used to blank the output window. The cursor is set to the top left (to row 1, column 1).
sections.text_content: The cls (clear screen) procedure is used to blank the output window. The cursor is set to the top left (to row 1, column 1).
sections.mdown_content: The **cls** (clear screen) procedure is used to blank the output window. The cursor is set to the top left (to row 1, column 1).

sections.title: Details
sections.raw_content:
The entire output window is set to the current text background color (as set by colorback or Text.ColorBack).

The output window must be in "graphics" mode. See setscreen for details.
sections.text_content:
The entire output window is set to the current text background color (as set by colorback or Text.ColorBack).
The output window must be in "graphics" mode. See setscreen for details.
sections.mdown_content:
The entire output window is set to the current text background color (as set by **colorback** or **Text.ColorBack**).
The output window must be in "*graphics*" mode. See **setscreen** for details.
